name: Neuro-Syringe of the Void
description: A single dose of this experimental neural cocktail grants a brief but intense connection to the digital void. Visions and glitches bleed into reality.

flavor.rationale: Developed by rogue netrunners attempting to push the boundaries of human-machine interface, Neuro-Syringe is highly sought after on the black market for its ability to provide temporary access to hidden data streams or induce altered states of consciousness.
